importantArticles.headline: Home energy technology company Enphase (NASDAQ:ENPH) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 35.2% year on year to $356.1 million. Next quarter’s revenue guidance of $360 million underwhelmed, coming in 4% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.68 per share was 6% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
